title: [Rails] respond.json { render partial: ...
content: [Rails] respond.json { render partial: ... Ruby on Rails Saturday, June 2, 2018 I'm trying to render an html partial with repsond.json I dunno if that's what I really need to do It's for a flag link and collects the users remote_ip then if they try to flag again I wanna display a notice 'You already flagged this post' and re-fill the div with the flag link again Thanks in advance -- You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups "Ruby on Rails: Talk" group. contentWithMarkup:
I'm trying to render an html partial with repsond.json I dunno if that's what I really need to do It's for a flag link and collects the users remote_ip then if they try to flag again I wanna display a notice 'You already flagged this post' and re-fill the div with the flag link again Thanks in advance
